messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I let my bird Pokémon carry me to
wherever. And so, here I am!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Sheesh... I arrive in a new place, and
it turns out to be the Battle Zone...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I was born in the Hoenn region.
I’ve only just recently flown here.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I let my bird Pokémon do as they
wish. And so, we train here daily!
